description: This file contains a JUnit integration test class for validating Spring Boot controller input validation using MockMvc and asserting proper validation behavior.

classes.name: ValidationIntegrationTest
classes.description: A Spring Boot integration test class that verifies the validation of controller input, specifically ensuring that invalid input results in proper error responses.

methods.name: createNote_blankTitle_returnsBadRequestWithFieldErrors
methods.description: Tests that submitting a note with a blank title results in a 400 Bad Request with appropriate validation error messages.
